author: cedricbritton.com
title: How One Company Figured Out A Way To Increase College Graduation Rates [Disruptive] | Elite Daily - CedricBritton.com
text:
[Sponsored by Strayer Education] http://www.strayer.edu/new-homepage?MarketingCode=DG267 What if you could see the future? Well, you can’t- but with Civitas Learning, you’ll come closer than ever!
We visited this Austin, TX company to see how they’re putting foresight and insight back into the hands of college students. Civitas Learning works with universities to collect and utilize data, predictive analytics and machine learning to power their apps.
Their standout app, Degree Map, helps college students plan their entire course of study from Day 1. It helps students plan and make the most of their education, and it’s a crucial tool that can be useful to any student in a day and age when higher education can be a quarter of a million dollar investment .
With Degree Map, there’s no more cramming classes in at the last minute during Senior year, or accidentally taking classes that won’t even end up counting toward your major. Degree Map provides powerful financial insights to help students understand the implications of making changes to their course of study. It has been instrumental in keeping students in school, especially those considering dropping out, by showing them how much more they’ll have to spend to finish their degree.
Their goal is to help a million more college students continue to learn and finish strong. We have a feeling they’ll make it happen. As their slogan goes, “Science, in the hands of smart and caring people, can change the world.”
This is the fourth episode of the new series “Disruptive,” which highlights disruptive innovators sponsored by Strayer Education.
